item.title: [Python] Performance comparison of Python web frameworks (Django, Flask, responder, FastAPI, japronto)
item.description: I made a simple API using the following Python Web framework and tried a load test. Django (2.X) Flask FastAPI responder japronto As a result, I found the following roughly! Performance can be said to be “japronto »> FastAPI> responder »> Flask ~ Django” FastAPI and responder are single workers, and if they request about 100-1000 seconds per second**, they have overwhelming performance in the python world almost the same level as japronto** (The code used for the verification is here.
